item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The secret inside One Million Checkboxes (1007 points | 76 comments)
2. Bypassing airport security via SQL injection (1443 points | 317 comments)
3. Elasticsearch is open source, again (469 points | 241 comments)
4. Rust's Ugly Syntax (2023) (29 points | 15 comments)
5. Time-Memory Trade-Offs Sound the Death Knell for GPRS and GSM (3 points | discuss)
6. Calendar Queues: A Fast O(1) Priority Queue Implementation (1998) (12 points | 2 comments)
7. Predicting the future of distributed systems (31 points | 4 comments)
8. The Thin Purple Line (12 points | 1 comment)
9. I'm blocking connections from AWS to my on-prem services (93 points | 37 comments)
10. SDL3 new GPU API merged (123 points | 45 comments)
11. Chrome is entrenching third-party cookies that will mislead users (345 points | 164 comments)
12. Google Closure Library has been archived (110 points | 42 comments)
13. Visit Bletchley Park (68 points | 23 comments)
14. Firewall rules: not as secure as you think (94 points | 35 comments)
15. Launch HN: CodeViz (YC S24) – Visual maps of your codebase in VS Code (138 points | 53 comments)
16. Show HN: Amine – Prevents you from switching 100s of Browser Tabs (49 points | 13 comments)
17. Can solar costs keep shrinking? (278 points | 426 comments)
18. Show HN: bpfquery – experimenting with compiling SQL to bpf(trace) (5 points | 2 comments)
19. Anthropic's Prompt Engineering Interactive Tutorial (189 points | 39 comments)
20. Open Source Twitch for Developers (9 points | discuss)
21. DuckDuckGo for Mac is now open source (102 points | 27 comments)
22. Raspberry Pi Pico does line rate 100M Ethernet (201 points | 30 comments)
23. Mastering ISO 8583 Message Networking with Golang (28 points | 5 comments)
24. Show HN: A discovery-focused search engine for Hacker News (142 points | 24 comments)
25. Poly (YC S22) is hiring Rust experts in SF to build "Arc browser for files" ( | hide)
26. Tabbed out on the Oregon Trail (3 points | discuss)
27. Show HN: An open-source, local-first Webflow for your own app (190 points | 44 comments)
28. Judges rule Big Tech's free ride on Section 230 is over (379 points | 426 comments)
29. How I learned to stop worrying and love userspace networking (151 points | 43 comments)
30. Blood Disorder: Unveiling the Mystery of My Poisoning in Sweden (31 points | 13 comments)
